entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
